Getting Started
===============

Installation
------------

You can install ``libf0`` with:

.. code-block:: bash

  pip install libf0

Contributing
------------

For development, testing, or generating the API documentation, clone the git repository and install:

.. code-block:: bash

    git clone https://github.com/groupmm/libf0.git
    cd libf0
    pip install -e .[dev,tests,docs]
